description: '''Flatfoot 56''' is an American [[Celtic punk]] band formed in [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], in 2000. Known for their use of Scottish [[Great Highland bagpipe|Highland bagpipes]], the group performs an [[Oi!]] and Celtic punk sound similar to [[Dropkick Murphys]] and [[Flogging Molly]]. They have released seven studio albums and seven [[Extended play|extended plays]]; their fifth album, [[Black Thorn (album)|''Black Thorn'']] (2010), debuted at No. 2 on the [[Top Heatseekers|''Billboard'' Heatseekers]] chart and No. 160 on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] at.
